description:
This low-profile PFD provides comfortable performance for long days on the water. A large, front pocket keeps sunscreen and other personal items handy. The cross-cinch straps keep the foam low on the torso for a good fit, even when swimming.

  • Adjustable contoured shoulder straps are padded for comfort on bare skin
  • Cross-Chest Cinch harness eliminates the vest from riding up
  • Low cut, offset front-zip makes entry and exit simple
  • Large arm openings allow unrestricted paddling
  • Spacious, top-loading front pocket for secure storage and easy accessibility
  • S/M fits chests 84-99cm, L/XL fits chests 102-116cm, XXL fits chests 122-137cm
name: Stohlquist Rocker PFD - Unisex
